mapper.select: SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.pprice, p.pcontent, b.bname, p.clarge, p.cmedium, p.csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.pcode = #{pcode} AND p.bno = b.bno

SELECT rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pcontent as pcontent, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.clarge = #{category.clarge} AND p.cmedium LIKE '%' AND p.csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bno = p.bno ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{page.startRowNo}
SELECT pcode, pcolor, imgurl1, imgurl2, imgurl3, imgurl4, imgurl5 FROM color WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product WHERE clarge = #{clarge} AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%'

SELECT rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, pcode, pname, pprice, pcontent, bname, clarge, cmedium, csmall FROM ( SELECT p.pcode as pcode, p.pname as pname, p.pprice as pprice, p.pcontent as pcontent, b.bname as bname, p.clarge as clarge, p.cmedium as cmedium, p.csmall as csmall FROM product p, brand b WHERE p.clarge LIKE '%' AND p.cmedium LIKE '%' AND p.csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bno = p.bno AND b.bname = #{brand.bname,javaType=String ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{page.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{page.startRowNo}
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product WHERE clarge LIKE '%' AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%'
SELECT COUNT(pcode) FROM product p, brand b WHERE clarge LIKE '%' AND cmedium LIKE '%' AND csmall LIKE '%' AND b.bno = p.bno AND b.bname = #{brand.bname,javaType=String ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
